EmailTemplate.description: EFT payment from a cash sale customer
EmailTemplate.name: EFT payment from a cash sale customer
EmailTemplate.subject: EFT payment from a cash sale customer (Ensure to cc in youself & ensure 7 Topic have your information)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello Team
Can you please check if we have received a EFT payment from a cash sale customer. The details are as follows:
Acc #: IE 550Parts Branch: IE Perth (550) Company Name: IE Harvey Farm CO: IE 7545386 Reference ID: IE QU#9838134 (Prefer CO7545386) Date CO Processed: IE 19/11/2019 Amount: IE $730.80 (incl GST)
No goods have been shipped to the customer as the CSC are awaiting clear funds. Please Reply All to this email once the payment has been received and we will reply with invoice number once invoiced.
Regards
Cummins Support Centre
E. 1300cummins@cummins.com AUSTRALIA T 1300Cummins | F 1300 286 600 | NEW ZEALAND T 0800Cummins | F 0800 286 600
PARTS | MON - FRI 8.00am - 8.30pm AEST | SAT 8.00am - 4.00pm AEST SERVICE | 24 hours a day, 7 days a week
CONFIDENTIALITY NOTICE: This email and any attachments are for the exclusive and confidential use of the intended recipient and may contain privileged information. If you are not the intended recipient, please do not read, distribute or take action in reliance upon this message. If you have received this in error, please notify us immediately by return email and promptly delete this message and its attachments from your computer system. We do not waive attorney-client or work product privilege by the transmission of this message.
www.cummins.com.au
